attributes.action: allow the armed forces singing trio "THE SOLDIERS" to sing the National Anthem in uniform at the Command Performance, in the presence of the QUEEN.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What IDIOT said members of our Armed Forces in uniform cannot sing our National Anthem to the QUEEN

rejection.details: This a matter for the organisers of the Royal Variety Performance, not for government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
